XMVP.Story: { "title": "The Homecoming at No. 28", "synopsis": "A group of 6 people in a room, avoiding the truth.", "characters": [ "Stanley (The Proprietor) [Male] {Rudolph Valentino at age 65}", "Meg (The Wife) [Male] {John Cazale at age 65}", "Goldberg (The Visitor) [Male] {Cary Grant at age 55}", "Arthur (The Lodger) [Female] {Bette Davis at age 35}", "Brenda (The Sister) [Female] {Mochelle Pfeiffer at age 65}", "Iris (The Caretaker) [Female] {Mochelle Pfeiffer at age 25}" ], "theme": "Hero's Journey" }
